{		"_id": "5c5410a9f0481f4870337184",
        "requirements": ["We will need you to be older than 25",  "You must know speak portuguese"],
        "cancelled": false,
        "published": false,
        "title": "Two months in Lisboa",
        "description": "Lisbon is the spectacular capital of Portugal and one of the most vibrant and charismatic cities in Europe; it is a city that effortlessly blends its heritage and tradition with striking modernism and progressive thinking.As a holiday destination, Lisbon offers a rich and varied history, a lively nightlife and a fantastic climate all year round. On this trip you will find an introduction to Lisbon, answers to some of the most common questions about a holiday there and more detailed historical information. ",
        "startDate": "2019-08-11T04:11:00.000Z",
        "endDate": "2019-10-11T04:11:00.000Z",
        "stages": [{"title":"History","description":"Visit the most historical places of the city with the help of guides who will tell you all the details!", "price":80.90},{"title":"Leisure places","description":"Meet the most popular Lisbon sites to make friends and have a great time! ", "price":50.80}],
        "pictures": [],
        "manager": "5c74ef8c52d4fa6d6ffff848"
    }
